page.title: 15Warningore House and Farm
page.content: {Warningore House}is off the B2116 between Lewes and Plumpton.The McGregors live there.They live in the country because they hate towns.The disadvantages of living in the country are that it's muddy and very windy and they get snowed in in the winter.They shop in Lewes.The farm is very near Warningore House. There are 16 rooms and a flat with 3 rooms.All the rooms except the flat are used.The house is one room wide in the traditional Sussex style and the walls are 10 inches thick.There is a well 20 feet deep under the house. There are 5 unused stables,but they have 2 dogs and 3 cats.They have a pond with a decoy heron to stop other herons eating the 400 goldfish. They own 13 acres of land,10 of which is rented to the farm. They only grow vegetables and they cut all the grass
